bibliography.title: A New Potential Energy Surface for the CH_3 + H_2 ⇌ CH_4 + H Reaction: Calibration and Calculations of Rate Constants and Kinetic Isotope Effects by Variational Transition State Theory and Semiclassical Tunneling Calculations
